thread.title: Greek PM seeks 30% debt haircut, grace period for 20 years
thread.title_full: Greek PM seeks 30% debt haircut, grace period for 20 years

title: Greek PM seeks 30% debt haircut, grace period for 20 years
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Fri, Jul 3, 2015, 15:15 BST - UK Markets close in 1 hr 15 mins Greek PM seeks 30% debt haircut, grace period for 20 years AFP – 31 minutes ago View Photo 

Greece's Prime Minister Alexis Tsipras on Friday spelt out debt restructuring demands he wants international creditors to adopt, ahead of a weekend referendum he hopes will strengthen his position in negotiations. 
In a television address, Tsipras called for "a 30 percent haircut off the Greek debt" and "a 20-year grace period" for the rest, to ensure "the viability of debt" in Greece, which currently stands at nearly 180 percent of its gross domestic product (GDP).
